tool_description: This API will return your current timezone depending on your location. It has two endpoints. One accepts the query "location" and the other one accepts "hours" and "minutes". The first one returns the continent/city format of timezone while the other one returns the current UTC offset.
name: Timezones
title: Timezones

api_list.name: Timezone
api_list.description: This endpoint accepts the query "location" and returns your time and timezone in json format.

api_list.name: Timezone UTC
api_list.description: This endpoint accepts the "hours" and "minutes" query fields and returns the time and UTC offset in json format.
